title: 装了新MOD之后，游戏崩溃
txt_content:
本来用的是懒人包，后来装了些新MOD之后，就崩溃了。崩溃报告如下

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to J:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-02_12.52.32-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 3bf04ef8 --------
Full report at:
J:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-02_12.52.32-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
Generated 13-3-2 下午12:52

replies.txt_content: 好吧，吧是不懂这些，不过我第一个看到里面的字眼是@专业坑爹三十年

1allen 发表于 2013-3-2 13:00 
有一些mod发生冲突
可以知道是那些MOD吗
